description: Funny play on words with a dinosaur.
title: Stega-snore-us
n_1: Toby and Dina are talking about dinosaurs.
c1_1: Hey Dina, do you know what kind of dinosaur loves to sleep?
n_2: Toby grins, ready to deliver his punchline.
n_3: Dina laughs while Toby looks proud.
c2_3: You always crack me up, Toby.
n_4: They both share a hearty laugh.
c1_4: I’ve got more jokes where that came from!
